title: Heart of the Wood
description: When Pax left for the Music Conservatory to pursue his dream of becoming a Master Craftsman, he also left his family in a bind. Now, home for the Candlefire Celebration, he discovers his role has been filled by a less-than-perfect replacement.Can Pax repair his broken relationships before returning to the conservatory, or will he have to choose between his family and his dream?"Heart of the Wood" is an "Inharmonic" companion story, however it is spoiler-free and can be read as a stand-alone.It is available exclusively as a free download for readers who subscribe to A.K.R. Scott's email list. (see www.akrscott.com for details)
author: A.K.R. Scott
